description:
《英文天天写》是沪江部落一档写作类节目，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

背景介绍：

近年来，一个新兴的应用“微博”在互联网上的迅速发展。微博服务在反映民意，汇聚民智，信息传播和社会服务等方面发挥了积极作用。但是，在微博发展过程中，也出现散播谣言和虚假信息，买卖“粉丝”，微博水军互喷，利用微博进行欺诈等突出问题，这些行为严重损害了公共利益，引起网站，用户和公众的不满，社会各方强烈呼吁加强互联网的诚信建设，规范微博客服务管理保障互联网健康发展。
Nowadays, the wide application of weibo has become one part of our life in modern society for sharing. Just as the saying goes, every coin has two sides. The development of weibo brings postive and negative impacts on our society or network circumstance. It is urgent to carry out real-name system to protect public interests and prevent cyber crimes.What about your thinking?

话题：

For today's topic, please select one listed below to share your thoughts:
1. What are the advantages of promoting weibo real-name system? What about its disadvantages?
2. What are the possible obstacles in promoting weibo real-name system?
3. What are the impacts after carrying out real-name system in weibo application?

范例1：

As far as I am concerned, the practice of real-name system for weibo is a trend and necessary for future sustainable development. Firstly, real-name registration does not impose restrictions on public freedom of expression, instead it aims to prevent rumors or false information from spreading over the network and arouse public panic. People should be conscientious for the comments. Moreover, the act is a civilized symbol to regulate weibo violent languages and harmful behaviors that take advantage of weibo for private profits. Overall, the promotion of real-name system is beneficial to the formation and improvement of healthy Internet culture, which is feasible, reasonable and indispensable.

范例2：

According to statistics, the real-name system in the Weibo application shown great process since the 16th of March, 2012: More than half of the users decided to forward weibo via their mobile phones. Carrying out the real-name policy will greatly filters out those artifical followers and invalidated news, which further creating a user-friendly environment for the publics. But, is it really so? Personally, I had been a weibo user since 2009, but weibo blocked my account twice for no particular reasons. Facing with the real-name system, it is also not fair for the minor users. Most minor and oversea users have a hard time to gain access to weibo, for verifying the real-name system by ID, driver license, and business card are inefficient.

范例3：

Blog real-name system is a double-edged sword. On one hand, netizen will not write whatever they want, such as rumors or cheating. On the other hand, it is actually the way for authority to control the freedom of speech. Once something spreading is not consistent with government, they can easy to find the source and suppress the discord sound in time. In my opinion, I reluctantly support the blog real-name system. The soul of the blog is the freedom, which attracts hundreds of thousands of people attention and the registration number is still increasing every day. Once the soul is deprived what could be remaining?

description:
本节目为沪江部落一档美语发音模仿节目，每期节目选取30秒左右的慢速VOA新闻内容，主持人亲自朗读示范模仿发音，对发音要点进行讲解，并配以详细的语音语调示意图，手把手教你练就地道美音范儿！想要得到主持人专业的点评和意见吗？去沪江部落订阅本节目！

今日主持人：snowflakeyx

30秒音频：

主持人模仿音频：

模仿文本：A fall guy takes the rap for something wrong or illegal. He accepts responsibility and punishment for what someone else did. The fall guy may have been involved in the situation, but was not the person who should be blamed. The word rap has meant blame for several hundred years. The expression to take the rap first was used about one hundred years ago.

译文：替罪羊为错误行为或违法之事而承担责任。他们也会承担他人犯下的错事的责任和惩罚。替罪羊可能被卷入这种状况，但不是应当受到责罚的人。Rap这个词曾有几百年都被用来指“惩罚”的意思。Take the rap这个短语最初被是在大约一百多年前被用到。

重点单词发音讲解：

Accept [ækˈsɛpt]
responsibility [rɪˌspɑnsəˈbɪlɪti]
involved [ɪnˈvɑlvd]
